results.name: wordpress-namespace/wordpress-6f7fdcf4cd-m42fp

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.

results.name: wordpress-namespace/wordpress

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-6f7fdcf4cd-m42fp], expected 1

results.details:
Error: The service doesn't have any ready endpoints because the pod "wordpress-6f7fdcf4cd-m42fp" isn't ready, but 1 is expected.

Solution: 1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`. 2. Inspect pod details using `kubectl describe pod wordpress-6f7fdcf4cd-m42fp`. 3. Resolve any issues (e.g., image pull errors, crash loops). 4. Ensure readiness probes are correctly configured.
